comments.body: Will this make it racey to not wait here?

This is not correct. The tests will sometimes run before we seed the RNG. Is it too slow? I can add a way to seed with some in-memory numbers - though that will get rid of the basic fuzz testing we had.
Wait, ignore this. I somehow missed the change to make seedRandom sync.

Yeah, it was just async to read a few bytes from a file, and that can be done just as easily w/ sync read. I generally prefer `fooSync()` to `await fooAsync()` when a sync version of a method is available.
